tataH rAja mantri sattamam sumantram vAkyam abravIt kSipram brahma vAdinaH rit vij aH su yajYam vAm ad evam jA bAl im aTa kASyap am purohitam vaS izWam ca ca ye ca anye dvija sattamAH A vAh aya
